amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-152 to require national governing bodies to clearly list dedicated information and resources, which may include sexual assault hotlines and victim support resources, on their official websites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
